descbody.para: Repairing an electric resistance spot welded joint in three thicknesses depends on the panels to be replaced, as well as the stack and access.
Before working on the vehicle, mark exactly the stack of panel(s) to be replaced and the access to the joint in order to use the appropriate method.
If necessary, scour the joint lines to bring out the spot welds.

sieref.linkdesc: bodywork cleaning tools : description
paint and rigid adhesive stripping tools : use
body structure unpicking tools : use

descbody.para: Remove the part to be replaced.

noteR.para: Do not strike or damage the panel.

sieref.linkdesc: shaving tools : description

descbody.para: Position the replacement part, adjust it and fix it using the locking pliers.
If necessary, reassemble the adjacent components and check the panel gaps.

sieref.linkdesc: body structure maintenance and adjustment tools : use

descbody.para: Mark the joint areas.
Remove the replacement part.

descsection.para: Scour the internal and external faces at the weld zones on the replacement part and on the vehicle.

sieref.linkdesc: bodywork cleaning tools : description
paint and rigid adhesive stripping tools : use

descbody.para: Position the acoustic inserts in the hollow sections, if necessary.

sieref.linkdesc: soundproofing product before assembly : description

descbody.para: Apply the anti-corrosion protection to the internal mating faces according to the type of weld.

sieref.linkdesc: anti-corrosion protection before assembly : description

descbody.para: Resistance spot welded joints

sieref.linkdesc: body structure resistance welding : precautions for the repair

descbody.para: Reposition the replacement part, adjust it and fix it using the locking pliers.
Reassemble the adjacent components if necessary and check the panel gaps.

sieref.linkdesc: body structure maintenance and adjustment tools : use

descbody.para: Weld the panels, making the points at the original locations.
There is no particular finish to be carried out on this type of weld; it must look the same as the original.

description.title: Special note on the replacement part

descbody.para: The Parts Department provides replacement parts with a special preparation, the points to be welded into three layers during assembly on the vehicle are pre-welded in two layers on the new part.
During welding of the end points on the vehicle, the operator must perform exactly as the points where the points existing on the part, for correctly stacking during welding.

descbody.para: Mark the joint areas.

Scour the internal face at the plug welds.

descbody.para: Scour the edges of the drilling holes on the internal and external faces.
